alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:57AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, northeastern St. James, southwestern St. Tammany, southeastern Livingston and southern Tangipahoa Parishes through 1230 PM CDT... At 1156 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Madisonville to 8 miles north of Reserve. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Ponchatoula, Gramercy, Lutcher, Abita Springs, Madisonville, Garyville, Lacombe and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 191 and 199. Interstate 12 between mile markers 47 and 69. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 9 and 14, and between mile markers 16 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. James; St. John The Baptist
